name: Dengeki Bunko vs Blazblue
description:
The Crossover of The Year

Dengeki vs Blazblue is a special project developed by the creator of Anime Battle Stars and Anime Supreme Battle and trademarked under the company Fate Technologies. It was also managed and made by the official developing team of Anime Battle Stars.

The full experience consists of characters from the official Dengeki Bunko archive and from BlazBlue, along with characters from other series such as UnderNight-IN BIRTH,  RWBY, Persona 4 and many more. 

CONTROLS

Dengeki vs Blazblue's controls follow the same format as Anime Battle Stars.  Whereas the game uses a six button layout, alot of characters both use the top and bottom buttons.

DEFAULT CONTROLS

D - Foward 

A - Back

W - Jump

S - Duck

I,O,P,J,K,L - Attack Buttons

Enter - Taunt

Controls can also be changable in the Options Menu.

FEEL FREE TO TRY OUT OUR OTHER PROJECTS!
